bibl.title: Doctors in the Library: The Strange Tale of Apollonius the Bookworm and Other Stories.
The Library of Alexandria, Centre of Learning in the Ancient World
bibl.author: VALLANCE, John

bibl.note: Introduction. - 1. Alexandria, books and the Hippocratic tradition. - 2. The Herophileans and the rise of Hippocratic lexicography. - Conclusion.
VALLANCE John, Doctors in the Library: The Strange Tale of Apollonius the Bookworm and Other Stories.
Roy MacLEOD (Ed.), The Library of Alexandria, Centre of Learning in the Ancient World (London - New York, 2000) pp. 95-113.
